means: 交给下属（或下层、晚辈等）

sentence.Network_en: We have made a conscious effort to devolve responsibility.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们已有意识地下放职责。

sentence.Network_en: When the President is ill, his duties devolve on the Vice - President.
sentence.Network_cn: 总统生病时, 其职责由副总统代理.

sentence.Network_en: Additional powers will devolve to the regional governments.
sentence.Network_cn: 将向地方政府下放更多的权力.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根 - 豆丁网 ... devoid 缺乏,无的 devolve 移交,委任 Top DE-,DI-,DIS- away,off,not 分离,否定.
英语词根1-4篇.doc - 豆丁网 ... revolve 旋转 devolve 转移 xeno 异,外国人.
会计词汇E ... deviation 偏差 devolve 转予；转承 difference 差额.
会计词汇E ... deviation 偏差 devolve 转予；转承 difference 差额.

list.abs: some businesses resolve this by creating franchises ; others devolve power to regional branches and avoid any form of head office or holding company mentality .一些公司通过创建特许公司来解决这个问题，其他公司则向区域分支机构下放权力，并摈弃任何关于总公司或者是控股公司的想法。
First minister of devolved Scotland since 2007 in a minority government ., 自从 2007 成为苏格兰移交少数政府的首席大臣以来.
The central government has decided to devolve authority on the regions ., 中央政府已决定将权力下放给地方.

analysts point out that the field of foreign investment in commercial and approve devolve to further streamline the vetting procedures so as to promote the opening to the distribution sector in China .分析人士指出，外商投资商业领域的审批权下放，能够进一步简化审核程序，从而稳步推进我国分销业的对外开放。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'roll down'): from Latin devolvere, from de- 'down' + volvere 'to roll'

entry.tran: （使）(权力、职责等)下放;（使） 移交
entry.def: If you devolve power, authority, or responsibility to a less powerful person or group, or if it devolves upon them, it is transferred to them.

example.ex: ...the need to decentralize and devolve power to regional governments...
example.tran: 将权力分散并下放给地方政府的需要

example.ex: We have made a conscious effort to devolve responsibility...
example.tran: 我们已有意识地下放职责。

means.word_mean: 1. pass on or delegate to another;

sentences.sentence: "The representative devolved his duties to his aides while he was in the hospital"
"The estate devolved to an heir that everybody had assumed to be dead"
"The discussion devolved into a shouting match"

auth_sentence.content: Why did he want to devolve the police service?
auth_sentence.res_content: Why did he want to devolve the police service?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Why did he want to devolve the police service?

auth_sentence.content: Why not devolve health care budgets to local government too?
auth_sentence.res_content: Why not devolve health care budgets to local government too?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Why not devolve health care budgets to local government too?

auth_sentence.content: Would it all devolve into a slugfest among hard-core fans?
auth_sentence.res_content: Would it all devolve into a slugfest among hard-core fans?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Would it all devolve into a slugfest among hard-core fans?

means.word_mean: 交给下属(或下层、晚辈等)

sentences.en: Upon his retirement, the business devolved on his son.
sentences.cn: 他退休时, 生意由儿子接管。

sentences.en: All the responsibility has devolved upon him.
sentences.cn: 所有的责任都落到了他身上。

sentences.en: Additional powers will devolve to the regional governments.
sentences.cn: 将向地方政府下放更多的权力。

means.word_mean: (将工作、职责、权力、责任等)交给下属(或下层等)

sentences.en: More powers are gradually being devolved to the regions.
sentences.cn: 正逐步向地方下放更多的权力。
